wikipedia_page.main: Sidney Cross (7 July 1925 – 11 May 2010) was a British athlete. He competed in the men's triple jump at the 1948 Summer Olympics.

response: Sidney Cross (5 January 1891 – 7 October 1964) was a British gymnast who competed in the 1912 Summer Olympics and in the 1920 Summer Olympics.
